summary: This is for you old guys who want some steak instead of venison all the time.
descriptionHtml:
This is for you old guys who want some steak instead of venison all the time.

Caesia-Elder is a replacer for Caesia follower. She's hiding out in Morthal Tavern.
HDT support

I actually worked 4 days on a follower and ended up scrapping the whole thing because I didn't know what I was doing. So I just made a replacer for a follower of someone who actually did know what they were doing plus it was structured as if he knew I would be coming along to make a replacer. Caesia the original mod. Great voice acting with a nice voice that could pass for age 20 through 70.


Â Hope y'all enjoy.

load order:
Caesia follower
Caesia Elder
